definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: Gambling shavings inadvertently found that the beneficiary on SunQiMing policy turned out to be yourself.
sentences.chinese: 奕茹无意中发现，孙启鸣保单上的受益人竟然是自己。

sentences.english: This credit is available with The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation, Shanghai by negotiation against beneficiary’s drafts drawn under this L/C at sight basis.
sentences.chinese: 本信用证在上海汇丰银行议付，随附受益人即期汇票。

sentences.english: We nave opened a confirmed credit in your favour.
sentences.chinese: 声誉证例文我们已开出以贵方为受益人的保兑声誉证。

sentences.english: RUBBER STAMP SIGNATURES OF THE BENEFICIARY ON DOCUMENTS ARE NOT ACCEPTABLE。
sentences.chinese: 盖有受益人橡皮图章的单据将不予接受。

sentences.english: After the license is approved, we shall establish an L/C in your favor.
sentences.chinese: 许可证批准后，我们就开立以你方为受益人的信用证。

sentences.english: The people concourse is the contriver of history and beneficiary.
sentences.chinese: 人民群众是历史的创造者和受益人。

sentences.english: The mortgagee shall be the first beneficiary to receive any insurance compensation within the mortgage period.
sentences.chinese: 在抵押期间，抵押权人为保险赔偿的第一受益人。

sentences.english: And I'll arrange for the Letter of Credit to be opened in your favor as soon as I get home.
sentences.chinese: 我一回往马上着手办理开立以你方为受益人的信用证。

sentences.english: Please notify Beneficiary and add your Bank's confirmation.
sentences.chinese: 请通知受益人并且增加你方银行的保兑。

sentences.english: We shall establish an L/C in your favor.
sentences.chinese: 我们会开以你方为受益人的信用证。

sentences.english: Accordingly, " insurance law " regulation, insurant or policy-holder can change beneficiary beneficiary.
sentences.chinese: 或者投保人可以变更受益人。

sentences.english: This credit is available with The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Ltd., Shanghai  by negotiation against beneficiary’s drafts drawn under this L/C at sight basis.
sentences.chinese: 本信用证在上海汇丰银行议付，随附受益人即期汇票。

sentences.english: ID Card of Beneficiary, Household Registry, Resume, Copy of Beneficiary's University Diploma.
sentences.chinese: 受益人身份证，户口本，简历，大学文凭的拷贝。

sentences.english: The beneficiary cannot be located at the address supplied. Please check if it is incomplete.
sentences.chinese: 你方提供的受益人地址无法确定，请查核是否完整。

sentences.english: The clause "All expences are for the beneficiaries' account" should be deleted from the L/C.
sentences.chinese: “一切费用由受益人负担”之条款应从信用证中删除。
